openwebui_variables.name: COMFYUI_API_KEY
openwebui_variables.description: Sets the API key for ComfyUI.

openwebui_variables.name: COMFYUI_BASE_URL
openwebui_variables.description: Specifies the URL to the ComfyUI image generation API.

openwebui_variables.name: IMAGE_GENERATION_ENGINE
openwebui_variables.description: Specifies the engine to use for image generation.
